note:
Forever curious | politically aware | opinionated | individualist | impatient | imperfect | polyglot.
I've always been anti-authority, pro-individualism, pro-reservation (affirmative action) and pro-choice of thought & action. I disregard societal laws and barely conform to its regulations. I also believe in equality in the true sense - whether it is of religion, caste, class, colour or gender. No one deserves to be mistreated or denied basic rights of life. That's the basic ideology i follow.
